comment._content: Wow, could this be a woman?

comment.author: 7776496@N03
comment._content: May be a woman, more than a few posed as men throughout the war, and even carried on as men til their deaths

comment.author: 38738853@N02
comment._content: Looks like a woman to me!

comment._content: My very first impression was that this is a women and I can see I'm not the only one! I'd love to know the true story behind this!

comment.author: 13786683@N00
comment._content: Absolutely looks like a woman to me. No disrespect to him/her.

comment.author: 10530558@N03
comment._content: I thought it looked like a woman, immediately.

comment.author: 12968960@N00
comment._content:
I didn't mean any disrespect to the person in the shot.  

Just got a bit carried away with the thought that it might be a woman dressing as a man in order to take part.

It's a great picture.

comment.author: 10530558@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/wurz] exactly.

comment.author: 33313202@N07
comment._content: I immediately thought this person may have been a woman also.  I too would love to know this person's story either way.

comment.author: 37159729@N04
comment._content: Baby boy !  So young - all these images are so beautiful and very moving to look at.

comment.author: 54995718@N05
comment._content: I immediately thought it was a female too. But in all likelihood, just a very young male soldier. These photos are just amazing!

comment.author: 10530558@N03
comment._content: Regardless of whether this is a portrait of a young man or women, there is a good amount of interesting information on women soldiers in the civil war: americancivilwar.com/women/

comment.author: 57382999@N08
comment._content: I also think this looks like a young woman. Look at the hips, seemingly wider than the waist.

comment.author: 8779264@N05
comment._content: ummm... maybe I'm seeing too much into this picture, but to me it this looks like a PREGNANT young woman, it looks like theres a good sized baby bump there- she's pretty far from being able to button that bottom button

comment.author: 62150568@N02
comment._content: Would a female have posed for a photograph? Most photographs were for family and would they have wanted them to know they had enlisted in disguise?

comment.author: 62285632@N06
comment._content: it looks like a young woman. could she be pregnant?

comment.author: 10530558@N03
comment._content: would guess that added bulk around the middle might help disguise what's on top...
